item_1.name: Sauce Labs Backpack
item_1.description: carry.allTheThings() with the sleek, streamlined Sly Pack that melds uncompromising style with unequaled laptop and tablet protection.

item_2.name: Sauce Labs Bike Light
item_2.description: A red light isn't the desired state in testing but it sure helps when riding your bike at night. Water-resistant with 3 lighting modes, 1 AAA battery included.

item_3.name: Sauce Labs Bolt T-Shirt
item_3.description: Get your testing superhero on with the Sauce Labs bolt T-shirt. From American Apparel, 100% ringspun combed cotton, heather gray with red bolt.
